START_TOUR_TEXT: Welcome to the tutorial of Eurostat's energy balance visualisation tool. This guided tour will show you the main ways of interacting with the tool. For a more detailed documentation click here.
STEP1_TEXT: Use this option to change fuels
STEP2_TEXT: Use this option to change countries
STEP3_TEXT: Use this option to change years
STEP4_TEXT: In this option you can download the table in different formats, search definitions or learn more about methodology
STEP5_TEXT: Just drag and drop the columns to change their position
STEP6_TEXT: Use this option to expand the flows of the energy balance table
STEP7_TEXT: Use this option to visualise the data of the energy balance table using pie charts, bar charts or line charts
STEP8_TITLE: Latest news in Eurostat's energy statistics
STEP8_TEXT: You can see the main news related to Eurostat's energy statistics
STEP9_TEXT: Press this button to access the tutorial
STEP10_TEXT: Sharing it with others on Twitter, Facebook, e-mail and LinkedIn will help us improve our tool. Thank you!
END_TOUR_TITLE: That is it for our tour.
END_TOUR_TEXT:
All the images illustrating the definitions in this tool are coming from Unsplash or pixabay.
If you find this visualisation tool useful, please share it with others using our social media buttons. Thank you!
